description.narrative: Output 8.3: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources to effectively plan and monitor programmes.

sector.narrative: Building evaluation capacity in UNICEF and the UN system
Country programme process (including UNDAF planning and CCA)
Humanitarian planning and review activities (HRP, RRP, UNICEF HAC)
Management and Operations support at CO
Stimulating demand for and capacity to use data

title.narrative: Zimbabwe United Nations Development Assistance Framework
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 8.3: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources to effectively plan and monitor programmes.

description.narrative: UNICEF strengthened staff and implementing partners' capacity to design and manage programmes resulting in high quality, RBM-compliant annual work plans integrating gender, humanitarian and disability being developed; 100% implementation of risk management efforts was achieved as well as for Partner Management Portal compliance; UNICEF also produced robust end user monitoring reporting and 2 two analytical reports of programmatic trips monitoring were produced to inform programme adjustment. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: Number of analytical reports generated on field monitoring visits
Number of staff trained in RBM
Proportion of resources mobilized against the HAC and CP 2016 2021

baseline.value: Key documentation outdated or not in place

target.value: 2020:Key documentation developed (Roadmap, SitAn, CPE, B4R strategy, PSNs, CPD draft, CCA, UNSDCF draft)

actual.value: 2019:Micro Assessments = 100%; Programmatic visits =210%; Spot Checks=100% Audits = 100%
